id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [DF-Player mini](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#configuration-variables)*

on_finished_playback.docs:
**[Automation](https://esphome.io/automations/index.html#automation)**: An action to be performed when playback is finished.

*See also: [DF-Player mini](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#configuration-variables)*

uart_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the UART hub.

*See also: [DF-Player mini](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#configuration-variables)*

play_next.docs:
Starts playback of next track or skips to the next track.

*See also: [`dfplayer.play_next` Action](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-play-next-action)*

play_previous.docs:
Plays the previously played track.

*See also: [`dfplayer.play_previous` Action](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-play-previous-action)*

file.docs:
**int, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: The file number inside the `mp3` folder to play.

*See also: [DF-Player mini](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-play-mp3-action)*

play_mp3.docs:
Plays a track inside the folder `mp3`. Files inside the folder must be numbered from 1 to 9999, like `0001.mp3`, `0002.mp3`, … etc. The folder name needs to be `mp3`, placed under the SD card root directory, and the mp3 file name needs to be 4 digits, for example, “0001.mp3”, placed under the mp3 folder. If you want, you can add additional text after the number in the filename, for example, `0001hello.mp3`, but must always be referenced by number only in yaml.

*See also: [`dfplayer.play_mp3` Action](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-play-mp3-action)*

file.docs:
**int, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: The global track number (from all tracks in the device). If not specified plays the first track.

*See also: [DF-Player mini](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-play-action)*

loop.docs:
**boolean, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: Repeats playing the same track. Defaults to `false`.

*See also: [DF-Player mini](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-play-action)*

file.docs:
**int, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: The file number inside the folder to play. Optional only if `loop` is not set.

*See also: [DF-Player mini](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-play-folder-action)*

loop.docs:
**boolean, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: Repeats playing all files in the folder. Causes `file` to be ignored. Defaults to `false`.

*See also: [DF-Player mini](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-play-folder-action)*

play_folder.docs:
Plays files inside numbered folders, folders must be numbered from 1 and with leading zeros. Like `01`, `02`, … etc. Files inside the folders must be numbered with two leading zeros, like `001.mp3`, `002.mp3`, … etc. Folder numbers can range from 1 to 99 and file name from 1 to 255 or folder number from 1 to 10 and file number from 1 to 1000.

*See also: [`dfplayer.play_folder` Action](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-play-folder-action)*

set_device.docs:
Changes the device in use. Valid values are `TF_CARD` and `USB`.

*See also: [`dfplayer.set_device` Action](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-set-device-action)*

volume.docs:
**int, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: The volume value. Valid values goes from `0` to `30`.

*See also: [DF-Player mini](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-set-volume-action)*

eq_preset.docs:
Eq Preset value. Valid values are `NORMAL`, `POP`, `ROCK`, `JAZZ`, `CLASSIC` and `BASS`.

*See also: [DF-Player mini](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-set-eq-action)*

sleep.docs:
Enters sleep mode. Playback is stopped and the action `dfplayer.set_device: TF_CARD` should be send for playback to be enabled again.

*See also: [`dfplayer.sleep` Action](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-sleep-action)*

start.docs:
Starts playing a track or resumes paused playback.

*See also: [`dfplayer.start` Action](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-start-action)*

pause.docs:
Pauses playback, playback can be resumed from the same position with `dfplayer.start`.

*See also: [`dfplayer.pause` Action](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-pause-action)*

is_playing.docs:
This Condition returns true while playback is active.

*See also: [`dfplayer.is_playing` Condition](https://esphome.io/components/dfplayer.html#dfplayer-is-playing-condition)*
